data.description:
This watch face will show some selected bible verses and their references.
The shown verse/reference will change every six hours. Additionally you can change to another randomly selected verse by tapping your watch in the first 2 seconds after loading the Watchface.
If you wish to have a selection of your own favorite verses, feel free to send me a list of verses + references.
